mapper.select: SELECT username, icon, email, nick_name, note FROM ums_user WHERE username = #{username} AND status = 1 LIMIT 1
SELECT name FROM ums_role JOIN ums_role_of_user ON ums_role.id = ums_role_of_user.role_id JOIN ums_user ON ums_role_of_user.user_id = ums_user.id AND ums_user.status = 1 WHERE ums_user.id = #{userId}

SELECT name FROM ums_permission JOIN ums_permission_of_role ON ums_permission.id = ums_permission_of_role.permission_id JOIN ums_role ON ums_permission_of_role.permission_id = ums_role.id AND ums_role.status = 1 JOIN ums_role_of_user ON ums_permission_of_role.role_id = ums_role_of_user.role_id JOIN ums_user ON ums_user.id = ums_role_of_user.user_id AND ums_user.status = 1 WHERE ums_user.id=#{userId}
